articles.description: Scientists have discovered that complex life began evolving much earlier than traditional models suggested. articles.title: Scientists find hidden layers in brain’s memory center
articles.description: Scientists uncovered a surprising four-layer structure hidden inside the hippocampal CA1 region, one of the brain’s major centers for memory, navigation, and emotion. articles.description: SPHERE’s detailed images of dusty rings around young stars offer a rare glimpse into the hidden machinery of planet formation.
